about.details:
Incorporated in 2016, Naturo Indiabull is in the business of the Fast-Moving Consumer Goods industry. The brand purchases a variety of products from manufacturers and sells them in its own brand directly to wholesellers and through agents.

It carries on the business of garments, textiles, jewellery, FMCG, Real Estate, Stone-Mines, Herbal Products, Automobile, Printing, Share Trading, providing education, Agriculture Seeds and Fertilizers, Hospitality, and Food items. It also trades in various health products and kits including sanitary towels, sanitary napkins, hand sanitiser, and other health kits. Currently, it is diversifying its product portfolio to health and herbal products i.e., soaps, shampoos, medicines, juices, tablets, etc.

Competitive strengths

  • A broad range of products helps to cater to a diversified customer base. 
  • Long-term relationship with customers.
  • Qualified and experienced management.
  • Strong relationship with suppliers.

faqs.question: What is the Naturo Indiabull IPO?
faqs.answer:
Naturo Indiabull IPO is a SME IPO of 3640000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹10.92 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹30 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on August 22, 2022, and closes on August 24, 2022.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Naturo Indiabull IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Naturo Indiabull IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Naturo Indiabull IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Naturo Indiabull IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Naturo Indiabull IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Naturo Indiabull IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Naturo Indiabull IPO opens on August 22, 2022 and closes on August 24, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Naturo Indiabull IPO?
faqs.answer: Naturo Indiabull IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Naturo Indiabull IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Naturo Indiabull IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Naturo Indiabull IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Naturo Indiabull IPO will be done on Monday, August 29, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, September 1, 2022. Check the Naturo Indiabull IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Naturo Indiabull IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Naturo Indiabull IPO listing date is on Friday, September 2, 2022.
